fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Empower another Galactic during the day to restore their abilities.
- Charge your laser at night.
- Fire your laser at a target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All charges will be stored until you fire your laser.
- Charges will be used to attack visitors to your target, at a 1 charge per visitor ratio. If you do not have enough charges to kill all visitors, the ones who die are randomized.
- Leftover charges are directed at your own visitors, at a 2 charge per visitor ratio. If you do not have enough charges to kill all visitors, the ones who die are randomized.
- You lose all charges when firing, even if some weren't used.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the extermination of all who would stand in the way of the intergalactic empire.
